It is very easy to get addicted to this game. I would play hours on end not even knowing that I would end up playing 10 hours a day. This game is amazing. The feelings you feel when you get headshots, rank up and winning are great. When you learn and become better you feel as if you achived something. Sure the game can be ruined by the amount of hackers in the game but if you buy prime you won't have much as a problem however if you don't buy prime you will be destroyed by spin botters. Not much else that I need to say but BUY THIS GAME.
